name: To The Stars (Proofsnail)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project

Modifications Made

  1. Game Design (Added a time slow feature that helps with dodging bullets)
  2. Game Design (Added Power ups that will aid the player in fighting enemies)
  3. Aesthetics (Added custom objects as well design a wall of white noise to prevent players from going out of the map)
  4. Aesthetics (Added Custom Menus & Win and Lose menus)

To be done in the next update:

  • Include more levels to tella proper story, becuase as of now the game only allows player to get used to the game mechanics I have introduced
  • Planned to include more RNG for the PowerUps to make it harder
  • Create more Diverse enemies

Credits:

Art & Songs: freeGameArt.com

Created by: Proofsnail
